text: Yesterday there were some kids at my workplace, touching everything in the shelves (you’re not supposed to touch it, there’s a sign). I tried to say something but neither the parent or the kid listened.  Things happened and that little shit drops a very expensive Lokomotive model, immediately destroying it. As if I didn’t see it, the family left. I hate people sometimes.
Yeah I know. I used to wear one with a little metal plate and slapped said metal against my wrist until it went blue. Not satisfying at all.
